precondition: The Windows desktop is visible, with the taskbar located at the bottom of the screen. The "Start" button, a green button with the word "start" and a white arrow, is visible on the left side of the taskbar.
expected_results: The Windows Start Menu will appear, displaying a list of programs and options, including "Control Panel".

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open and visible on the screen.
action: Click on the "Control Panel" option in the Windows XP Start Menu.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will open, displaying various icons and options for customizing system settings, managing programs, and configuring network connections.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel window is open.
action: Click on the "Appearance and Themes" icon.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" settings window will open. This window contains options to adjust the display settings, themes, screen savers, and the Start menu and taskbar.

precondition: The Windows XP "Appearance and Themes" Control Panel window is open.
action: Click on the "Display" icon, represented by a computer monitor with a color palette.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is visible.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab becomes active, and the preview pane displays the currently selected screensaver.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu displays "Windows XP".
action: Click the down arrow button located to the right of the "Windows XP" text field within the "Screen saver" section.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of available screensavers will appear.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Power" button is visible at the bottom of the window in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Click on the dropdown menu associated with the "System hibernates" setting.
expected_results: A list of time intervals will appear, allowing the user to select the desired duration of inactivity before the computer hibernates.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected. The "System hibernates:" setting should be visible with a dropdown menu.
action: Click on the dropdown menu next to "System hibernates:" and select "After 5 hours".
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and "After 5 hours" will be displayed next to the "System hibernates:" setting.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected in the dropdown menu.
action: Click the "Save As..." button located below the power scheme dropdown menu.
expected_results: A new dialog box will appear, prompting the user to enter a new name for the power scheme.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected.
action: Click on the "Always On" option within the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Always On" power scheme will be selected, and its settings will be displayed in the dialog box for editing.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Always On" power scheme is currently active.
action: Click on the dropdown menu associated with the "Turn off hard disks:" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with various time options for hard disk power-down will appear, allowing the user to change the current setting from "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open. The "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click on the dropdown menu labeled "Turn off monitor:"
expected_results: A list of time duration options (e.g., "Never", "After 1 minute", "After 2 minutes", etc.) will appear, allowing the user to select a new duration for monitor inactivity before it turns off.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open. The "System hibernates" setting is visible with its associated dropdown menu.
action: Click on the "Never" option within the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" setting will be set to "Never". The dropdown menu will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" dialog box is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the dialog box.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" dialog box will close. The user will be returned to the previous window, likely the "Appearance and Themes" section within the Windows XP Control Panel.

precondition: The 'Appearance and Themes' window is open in the Windows XP Control Panel.
action: Click on the 'Display' icon located in the 'Control Panel Icon Section' at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' dialog box will open.
